Have for sale the following T222 Fatima of Hans Lobert who is generally considered one of the tougher short prints.  Obvious condition issues.  Asking $750 delivered in the US or would prefer to trade for other T222 shortprints or E92's I need.  Please see scan below. Payment - check, postal money order, or Paypal friends & family. Regular Paypal, add an additional 3% to cover the fees. Any questions, please let me know. 

Thanks
DJ
